channel.title: Fastest Guide to 99 Smithing!
channel.description:
[center][b][size=24pt]Ultimate Guide to 99 Smithing![/size][/b]
This is my first guide, so please be nice! :P
Before we start, there are some tips you should know: If you are a member, then I [u]strongly[/u] suggest that you use a Sacred Clay Hammer, this doubles your experience. If you are not a member and therefore cannot use the Sacred Clay Hammer, then you should equipt the Golden Hammer to free up inventory space.
[b]Level 1 - 18[/b] This should only take about an hour, it doesn't really matter what kind of bronze armour that you smith. I made bronze daggers until level 12 then did bronze kiteshields until level 18.
[b]Level 18 - 33[/b] This method is quite fast because your going to be smithing Bronze Platebodies, this can be expensive but this is the fastest method, this shouldn't take long. [b]Experience:[/b] With SCH - 125 Without SCH - 62.5
[b]Level 33 - 48[/b] We're going to continue smithing platebodies for most of your journey to 99, so now we move onto Iron Platebodies, once again, this can be expensive but it is fast, this will take you about 2 hours. [b]Experience:[/b] With SCH - 250 Without SCH - 125
[b]Level 48 - 68[/b] You should continue making platebodies but this time you will be making steel ones, this method will take you about 1 day. [b]Experience:[/b] With SCH - 375 Without SCH - 187.5
[b]Level 68 - 88[/b] Continuing on with platebodies, we move onto Mithril Platebodies, you may start getting bored of smithing now, so most people quit. If you really are serious on 99 smithing then you should use this method. [b]Experience:[/b] With SCH - 500 Without SCH - 250
[b]Level 88 - 99[/b] By now your very close to 99, like in the past we are going to smith more platebodies, this time Adamant Platebodies. If you get bored making platebodies, then you can smith other armours, but I am only telling you the fastest methods. [b]Experience:[/b] With SCH - 625 Without SCH - 312.5
[center][b][size=18pt]Congratulations! You are now level 99 Smithing! :D[/size][/b][/center] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/b6f4lt.png[/img]
[b]Note[/b] This will be extended, but I'm tired and it's past my bedtime. ;) [b]Any suggestions? Comment below.[/center][/b]

item.title: Fastest Guide to 99 Smithing!
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“ForTheThrills, post:14, topic:400788”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=497844.msg3642164#msg3642164 date=1309082582]
Pfft, just do what my 15+ bots do, smith steal bars, 17 xp each. lol
[/quote]

Do you get much profit?

My main source of income is my bots cutting yews/mining gems :P[/quote]
If you do it right. I was (for like a year) buying coal, mining iron, and smithing bars. I made around 200 each then. I could have bought the iron and made like 20 each. Profit is profit when ur getging free xp.

Read full topic

item.title: Fastest Guide to 99 Smithing!
item.dc:creator: @ForTheThrills ForTheThrills
item.description:
@ForTheThrills wrote:

[center][size=24pt]Ultimate Guide to 99 Smithing![/size]

This is my first guide, so please be nice!

Before we start, there are some tips you should know:
If you are a member, then I strongly suggest that you use a Sacred Clay Hammer, this doubles your experience.
If you are not a member and therefore cannot use the Sacred Clay Hammer, then you should equipt the Golden Hammer to free up inventory space.

Level 1 - 18
This should only take about an hour, it doesn’t really matter what kind of bronze armour that you smith. I made bronze daggers until level 12 then did bronze kiteshields until level 18.

Level 18 - 33
This method is quite fast because your going to be smithing Bronze Platebodies, this can be expensive but this is the fastest method, this shouldn’t take long.
Experience:
With SCH - 125
Without SCH - 62.5

Level 33 - 48
We’re going to continue smithing platebodies for most of your journey to 99, so now we move onto Iron Platebodies, once again, this can be expensive but it is fast, this will take you about 2 hours.
Experience:
With SCH - 250
Without SCH - 125

Level 48 - 68
You should continue making platebodies but this time you will be making steel ones, this method will take you about 1 day.
Experience:
With SCH - 375
Without SCH - 187.5

Level 68 - 88
Continuing on with platebodies, we move onto Mithril Platebodies, you may start getting bored of smithing now, so most people quit. If you really are serious on 99 smithing then you should use this method.
Experience:
With SCH - 500
Without SCH - 250

Level 88 - 99
By now your very close to 99, like in the past we are going to smith more platebodies, this time Adamant Platebodies. If you get bored making platebodies, then you can smith other armours, but I am only telling you the fastest methods.
Experience:
With SCH - 625
Without SCH - 312.5

[center][size=18pt]Congratulations! You are now level 99 Smithing! :D[/size][/center]

Note This will be extended, but I’m tired and it’s past my bedtime.
Any suggestions? Comment below.[/center]

Read full topic
